description:
Itou Serika is one of Mutta`s fellow applicants in the astronaut program, who he has a huge crush on. When young, her father developed amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS) which could not be cured at the time. After he passed away, Serika became motivated to become an astronaut and develop new cures for rare diseases and illnesses aboard the International Space Station.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Itou Serika
